li.a: Smart Schools Bond Act Plan with addendum
2019-2020 My Place (before and after school care) Enrollment Application

img.alt: Regents Exams Update Related to COVID - 19
School is now closed through May 15th!
Budget Vote & Board of Education Election

div.h1: Regents Exams Update Related to COVID - 19
div.p: Please see the attached link for guidance on how the Regents examinations will be handled this year and how it will effect students moving forward.

a.aria-label: Regents Exams Update Related to COVID - 19: Visit Website

div.p: Here's a glimpse into our awesome staff working from home and those out in the community delivering meals to our children! We miss you students! #WGStrong

a.aria-label: WG Staff Working Hard! : Visit Website

div.p: All winter sports championships have been canceled due to the health crisis. A decision about spring sports is expected no later than April 27th. Please know local schools are still committed to provide some league games if allowed back to school by May 1st.

div.h1: School is now closed through May 15th!
div.p: School lunches will be provided for pick up at 7 locations. Breakfast is included for the following day with lunches. Locations are open 10 AM-11 AM at WGHS parking lot, Burdett Fire Hall, Hector Fire Hall, Reading Town Hall, Townsend - WGI Ticket Station, Tyrone - Corner of 21 & 23, Beaver Dams - NYS Rt 414 Pull Off.

a.aria-label: School is now closed through May 15th!: More Information

div.h1: Budget Vote & Board of Education Election
div.p: Board of Education candidate petitions are available in the District Office of the Watkins Glen High School. The annual Budget Vote & Board of Education Election will be postponed until further guidance is given from the state.

The next scheduled meeting of the Board of Education is Wednesday, April 22, 2020 at 6:00pm. This will be a virtual meeting that can be viewed by the public. A link to access the meeting is included below. If you are a district resident and wish to comment during our designated public comment time, please e-mail Renee Angle at rangle@wgcsd.org no later than 3:30pm on Wednesday, April 22, 2020.

a.aria-label: Board of Education Meeting: Visit Website
